 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺט‎</span>] **verb** ==totter, shake, slip== (usually in poetry) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, derived species; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּט‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (medial <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***remove, retire; deviate from right course; repel, push, thrust***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turn***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ma‰û***</u></abbr> is ***dwindle, diminish, grow weak*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 405</sup>; &gt; denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוט‎</span> ***pole, bar*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol.184</sup> [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verb. denominative 195 f.</sup>, compare [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֫טָה‎</span> [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] + 2 t.; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֫טוּ‎</span> [[Ps.46.7|Ps 46:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמוּט‎</span> [[Deut.32.35|Deut 32:35]]; [[Isa.54.10|Isa 54:10]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמוּטֶינָה‎</span> [[Isa.54.10|Isa 54:10]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺט‎</span> [[Ps.38.17|Ps 38:17]]; [[Ps.46.3|Ps 46:3]] ***absolute*** id. [[Isa.24.19|Isa 24:19]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָט‎</span> [[Isa.25.26|Isa 25:26]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָטִים‎</span> [[Prov.24.11|Prov 24:11]] — ***totter, slip***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגֶל‎</span> (figurative of insecurity) [[Deut.32.35|Deut 32:35]]; [[Ps.38.17|Ps 38:17]]; [[Ps.94.18|Ps 94:18]]: compare (without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגֶל‎</span>) [[Prov.24.11|Prov 24:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַהֶרֶד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵירָֿשָׁע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Prov.25.26|Prov 25:26]] ***shake***, intransitive, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָד‎</span> [[Lev.25.35|Lev 25:35]] ([[BDB#H|H]]; of feebleness); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבָעוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.54.10|Isa 54:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּשׁ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִים בְלֵב יַמִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ps.46.3|Ps 46:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵמִיר‎</span>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מור‎</span>) (both symbolic of extreme insecurity); compare subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִית‎</span> [[Isa.54.10|Isa 54:10]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְלָכוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.46.7|Ps 46:7]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> (= land) [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] compare [[Isa.24.19|Isa 24:19]] (see below Hithpa\`el) **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמ֫וֺטוּ‎</span> [[Ps.17.5|Ps 17:5]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמּוֺט‎</span> [[Ps.15.5|Ps 15:5]] + 8 t., etc.; — all in poetry, mostly with negative (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּל‎</span> 13 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span> 6 t.), ***be shaken, moved, overthrown***, of idols [[Isa.40.20|Isa 40:20]]; [[Isa.41.7|Isa 41:7]] of scales of crocodile [[Job.41.15|Job 41:15]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּבֵל‎</span> [[1Chr.16.30|1Chr 16:30]] = [[Ps.93.1|Ps 93:1]]; [[Ps.96.10|Ps 96:10]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Ps.104.5|Ps 104:5]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרצִֿיּוֺן‎</span> [[Ps.125.1|Ps 125:1]], compare [[Ps.46.6|Ps 46:6]] figurative of general disorder (no negative), subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺסְדֵי אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Ps.82.5|Ps 82:5]] often of righteous, as secure, [[Ps.10.6|Ps 10:6]]; [[Ps.15.5|Ps 15:5]]; [[Ps.16.8|Ps 16:8]]; [[Ps.21.8|Ps 21:8]]; [[Ps.30.7|Ps 30:7]]; [[Ps.62.3|Ps 62:3]]; [[Ps.62.7|Ps 62:7]]; [[Ps.112.6|Ps 112:6]]; [[Prov.10.30|Prov 10:30]]; [[Prov.12.3|Prov 12:3]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַדִּיקִים שֹׁרֶשׁ‎</span>); compare (without negative) [[Ps.13.5|Ps 13:5]]; [[Ps.140.11|Ps 140:11]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (so apparently [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]]; but meaning of Niph\`al not suitable; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] Hiph\`il q. v.); figurative of steadfast obedience (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּעָמַי‎</span>) [[Ps.17.5|Ps 17:5]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִ֫יטוּ‎</span> [[Ps.55.4|Ps 55:4]]; [[Ps.140.11|Ps 140:11]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] **Niph\`al**); — ***dislodge, let fall, drop*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִיטוּ עָלַי אָ֫וֶן‎</span> [[Ps.55.4|Ps 55:4]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּחָלִים וימיטו עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Ps.140.11|Ps 140:11]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], ***and may they drop coals upon them***, [[BDB#De|De]] and others; &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְטִיר‎</span> ([[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), which [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] insert. **Hithpo\`el.** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמוֺטְטָה מוֺט‎</span> [[Isa.24.19|Isa 24:19]] ***be greatly shaken*** (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶדֶץ‎</span> in judgment of' <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרר‎</span>, Hithpa\`el)
